definition: the part of an animal's body that corresponds to a person's chest, to confront bodily
details:
noun
- the part of an animal's body that corresponds to a person's chest
- the front of the trunk from the neck to the abdomen
= example: the front of the trunk from the neck to the abdomen
= synonyms: chest
- either of two soft fleshy milk-secreting glandular organs on the chest of a woman
= synonyms: boob
- meat carved from the breast of a fowl
= synonyms: white meat
verb
- to confront bodily
= example: to confront bodily
= synonyms: front
- to reach the summit of a mountain
= example: to reach the summit of a mountain
= synonyms: summit
- to meet at chest level
= example: to meet at chest level
